definitions.title: n.pl.abstr.
definitions.body: atonement, only in P: ´[[הַטַּאת הַכּ]] sin-offering of the atonement Ex 30:10, Nu 29:11; ´[[כ]]([[ה]])[[יוֹם ]] day of (the) atonement Le 23:27, Le 23:28, Le 25:9; ´[[אֵיל הַכּ]] Nu 5:8; ´[[עַל־הַכּ]] Ex 29:36; ´[[כֶּסֶף הכ]] Ex 30:16 money of atonement.
